_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: NXPM Discord Bot
author: owen@puds.lol
description: Deploys the BonerHosting NXPM Discord bot. Automatically downloads and installs the bot, then starts it using environment variables configured in the panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server

echo "🧹 Cleaning old files..."
rm -rf *

echo "⬇️ Downloading latest NXPM Discord Bot..."
curl -L https://bigboner.fun/code/archive-2026-02-21T044633Z.tar.gz -o bot.tar.gz

if [ ! -f bot.tar.gz ]; then
  echo "❌ Download failed."
  exit 1
fi

echo "📦 Extracting..."
tar -xzf bot.tar.gz

if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
  echo "❌ Extraction failed."
  exit 1
fi

rm bot.tar.gz

echo "📦 Installing dependencies..."
npm install --production

echo "🏗️Building some files"
curl -L https://bigboner.fun/code/db.js -o db.js


echo "✅ Installation complete."

variables.name: Discord Token
variables.description: Your Discord bot token from the Developer Portal.

variables.name: Client ID
variables.description: Your discord bot client ID from the dev portal

variables.name: NXPM URL
variables.description: The URL for your Nginx Proxy Manager instance

variables.name: NXPM Email
variables.description: The email for the NXPM account you'd like to use.

variables.name: NXPM Password
variables.description: The password for the email you put for the email.

variables.name: Hosting Name
variables.description: The name of your host etc
